response.original_title: The Communes of Rojava Six Years On: Towards Many Democracies of Neighbors
response.overview: Six years later sequel of "The Communes of Rojava" (2018), made in the face of some of the most dire attacks yet faced by the pluralist, women-led, radically democratic project in North and East Syria. Though deeply inspired by the Rojava Revolution, this film is not about the Kurdish and Syrian Revolutionsâ€™ influence for an activist in America.
response.title: The Communes of Rojava Six Years On: Towards Many Democracies of Neighbors
